author: jmartinb
body:
Add CentralityProducer to pp reco. Corresponding AOD event content extension and also for ZDC. Add ZDC to CentralityBinProducer.

See slides including event size increase estimations: https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/pub/CMS/HiCentrality2016/CentralityInppReco.pdf
title: Add CentralityProducer to pp reco. AOD event content extension. Add ZDC to CentralityBinProducer.
